name: My Vet Practice: In the Country
synopsis: Start your own vet practice in the countryside and build beautiful pens and stables for many different kinds of animals. You alone are in charge! Go out on house visits and examine the animals on the scene. Really sick animals can be admitted for in-patient care and healed in your animals hospital. Deer, lambs, dogs, cats, bunnies, parakeets, horses, puppies and kittens are already waiting for your help!
